name: Budapest
fun_fact: Fun fact: Budapest has more thermal springs than any other capital city in the world - over 120 natural hot springs produce 70 million liters of thermal water daily! The Romans built baths here, and the tradition of 'taking the waters' has continued for 2,000 years.
